name: Fantasy Tac#TicsToe
description:
Fantasy Tac#TicsToe - A unique twist on rules makes a classic game tactical and FUN again - for all ages!

Tired of playing regular Tic-Tac-Toe, or Nine Square with the same rules as regular Tic-Tac-Toe? As a kid how fun was it once you mastered the game? As an adult do you reluctantly play Tic-Tac-Toe with your children and pretend to lose so they feel good about themselves for winning? But that isn’t the end, they want to play again, and again, and the game is basically the same EVERY SINGLE TIME.

Say NO MORE to regular Tic-Tac-Toe – Check out Fantasy Tac#TicsToe.  

Fantasy Tac#TicsToe is an innovative tactical game that improves upon basic Tic-Tac-Toe with simple, elegant rules and mechanics that make tactics and strategy an integral part of the game.

In addition to new tactical gameplay Fantasy Tac#TicsToe also adds fantasy magical attacks, cool characters and environments, and interesting story lines to play through.

Play solo to experience in depth story arcs, or challenge a friend to one on one battle with mystical fantasy characters and creatures.

Fantasy Tac#TicsToe is currently in Alpha development and looking for feedback from interested players. 

If you’d like to follow the development of Fantasy Tac#TicsToe or if you are interested in keeping up with all Good ol’ Boy Games happenings, sign up for our newsletter on our blog.

If you’d like to provide feedback on the game or communicate directly with 
Good ol’ Boy Games developers you can send a message via email to goodolboygames@gmail.com.
